page.title: 18CLYST VALLEY COMMUTERS.
page.content: We carried out a survey to find out something about{people's travel in connection with their work. We found that very few people live within walking distance of their place of work.Most of the people we contacted have a journey of about twenty minutes and do not mind making this journey.{Pinhoe}has a frequent mini-bus service into Exeter which is used by a lot of people who live in that area. The rural areas have a much less frequent bus service which is only used by 5% in our sample.The great majority of people travel to work by private car.
